name: Protection of Helm: Slime Siege
description:
Meet Jerry, the mage.

Jerry is a bit of a, how to put it mildly, ah of course, let's say homicidal maniac.

He wants to create a powerful potion, but to finish it he needs a very special ingredient.

The Slime king's slime, not quite sure how the good king is supposed to survive that...

Oh well, Jerry begins his siege in the forest...

Additional sources: for audio

epidemicsounds.com/

https://freesfx.co.uk/
